title: Welcome, Carlos!
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 371 words, Level J (Grade 1), Fiction Series
description: Carlos has moved from Monterrey, Mexico, to the United States. He makes a poster to introduce himself to his new classmates. He also makes a new friend in his apartment building. Students have the opportunity to retell the story and sequence events. Readers will enjoy this story about making new friends in a new country.
reviewWords: abuela, factory, hola, Mexico, padre, relatives
wordWork: Foreign Vocabulary                : Recognize and use foreign vocabulary
